name: ChronorhC (Ludum Dare 48)
description:
Maneuver through the temple with the power of time and solve problems using your past self! 
Make sure you don't run out of time yourself!

Watch as time inverses itself as you pass through the portals

Head deeper and deeper into more paradoxes as you try to clear a way to your goal.

Controls
WSAD and arrow keys to move

Space to jump

R to restart
